# South Pahartali Ward

South Pahartali () is Ward No. 1 of Chattogram City Corporation and falls under the jurisdiction of Hathazari Model Thana, Bangladesh. It is part of the Chittagong-5 parliamentary constituency.
Area
South Pahartali Ward covers an area of 24 square kilometers.
Demographics
According to the 2011 Census, South Pahartali Ward has a total population of 29,209, including 14,763 males and 14,446 females. There are 6,101 households.
Location and Boundaries
South Pahartali Ward is located in the northernmost part of Chattogram City Corporation, approximately 7 kilometers from the city center. It is bordered by:
* South: 2 No. Jalalabad Ward
* East: Chikandandi Union, Hathazari Upazila
* North: Fatepur Union, Hathazari Upazila
* West: Sonaichhari Union, Bhatiari Union, and Salimpur Union of Sitakunda Upazila
Administration
South Pahartali is Ward No. 1 under Chattogram City Corporation. Administrative activities fall under Hathazari Model Thana, and it is part of Chittagong-5 (Constituency 282) in national parliamentary elections.
Notable areas within the ward include:
* Aman Bazar
* Chattogram Cantonment
* Fateyabad
* Borodighir Para.
Education
The literacy rate of South Pahartali Ward is 60.1%. The ward contains 1 college, 1 school & college, 2 madrasas, 4 secondary schools, and 7 primary schools.
